title: His Perfect Match
description: You asked for Vlad and Jackal's story - here it is! This is not a stand-alone story! If you haven't read The Omega Auction and The Omega Rescue book, it will not make sense and you will be disappointed!  5% of all royalties received for His Perfect Mate are donated to The Trevor Project to assist them in providing life-saving services to LGBTQ youth in crisis.
author: Kian Rhodes
